        public MGeneralRepository(int numPassengers,
                  int nBusSeats,
                  int busWaitTime,
                  int numFlights,
                  int maxBags,
                  java.lang.String path)
        Instanciates a MGeneralRepository object.
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - The number of passengers in each flight
        nBusSeats - The number of seats on the bus
        busWaitTime - The time, in mili-seconds, that the bus waits for new passengers
        numFlights - The number of flights in the simulation
        maxBags - The maximum number of bags that each passenger may have
        path - The path to the log file
